Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/natural.name: natural
Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/natural.abstract: Use the natural size of the view being tested.

Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/screenWidth.name: screenWidth
Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/screenWidth.abstract: Use the width of the current screen and the natural height of the view being tested.

Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/screenWidthT.name: screenWidthTableHeight
Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/screenWidthT.abstract: Use the width of the current screen and the height of it without status and navigation bars.

Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/size(width:h.name: size(width:height:)
Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html#/size(width:h.abstract: Use a concrete size of the container.

Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html.name: MMMTestCaseSize
Enums/MMMTestCaseSize.html.abstract: Possible sizes of a test container view used with verify(view:*) methods of MMMTestCase.

Classes/MMMLoadableExpectation.html#/ini.name: init(notSyncing:)
Classes/MMMLoadableExpectation.html#/ini.abstract: Fulfilled when the loadable is not syncing. This is convenient when the test is going to evaluate

Classes/MMMLoadableExpectation.html.name: MMMLoadableExpectation
Classes/MMMLoadableExpectation.html.abstract: Convenience for using XCTest’s expectations with loadables.
